  1. from cms.plugin_base import CMSPluginBase
  2. from cms.plugin_pool import plugin_pool
  3. from django.conf import settings
  4. from django import template
  5. from django.utils.safestring import mark_safe
  6. from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
  7. from django.template.context import Context
  8. from models import SnippetPtr
  10. class SnippetPlugin(CMSPluginBase):
  11. model = SnippetPtr
  12. name = _("Snippet")
  13. render_template = "cms/plugins/snippet.html"
  14. text_enabled = True
  16. def render(self, context, instance, placeholder):
  17. context.update({
  18. 'placeholder':placeholder,
  19. 'object':instance,
  20. })
  21. try:
  22. if instance.snippet.template:
  23. t = template.loader.get_template(instance.snippet.template)
  24. context.update({'html': mark_safe(instance.snippet.html)})
  25. content = t.render(Context(context))
  26. else:
  27. t = template.Template(instance.snippet.html)
  28. content = t.render(Context(context))
  29. except template.TemplateDoesNotExist, e:
  30. content = _('Template %(template)s does not exist.') % {'template': instance.snippet.template}
  31. except Exception, e:
  32. content = str(e)
  33. context.update({
  34. 'content': mark_safe(content),
  35. })
  36. return context
  38. def icon_src(self, instance):
  39. return settings.STATIC_URL + u"cms/images/plugins/snippet.png"
  41. plugin_pool.register_plugin(SnippetPlugin)
